qas.question: What is it called when males return earlier to the breeding sites than females?
What happens in polygynous species with sexual dimophism?

answers.text: males tend to return earlier to the breeding sites

qas.question: Why do males in polygynous species return before the females?

context: In polygynous species with considerable <a2_0>sexual dimorphism<a2_0/>, <a1_0>males tend to return earlier to the breeding sites<a1_0/> than their females. This is termed <a0_0>protandry<a0_0/>.
